column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I want to face Zaheer . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Korra , he 's too dangerous .
#Text=There 's no other way .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " There is another way .
#Text=I 'm calling your father .
#Text=He can lead an expedition into the Spirit World from the Southern portal .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 've lost faith in me , too , have n't you ?
#Text=No one thinks I 'm capable of anything anymore .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's not that at all .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know I can do this .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm just so worried for Jinora .
#Text=I ca n't imagine if something happened to you , too .
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin , please .
#Text=I 'll be okay .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Zaheer 's imprisoned deep in the mountains outside the city .
#Text=I 'll call Raiko and get the clearance .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you .
#Text="
